means: 暗中或秘密进行的，诡诈的

sentence.Network_en: It is a sneaky and underhand way of doing business.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种做生意的方式偷偷摸摸，遮遮掩掩。

sentence.Network_en: In softball, pitches are tossed underhand.
sentence.Network_cn: 垒球运动中采用低手投球。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Livingstone accused the government of being underhand.
sentence.Network_cn: 利文斯通先生指责政府搞欺诈。

... 反手（backhand）上手（overhead）下手（underhand） 发高远球（high deep service）击球（hit）场地（court） 名词术语 Intern…
垒球投球只能低手(underhand).棒球则随便。棒球可偷垒。
underhand weld 平焊焊缝underhand 手不过肩的underhaul 偏泊

list.abs: 课程小词典2_不游泳的鱼_新浪博客 ... 漫画 cartoon 猫腻儿 illegal deal;underhanded activity 冒名顶替 forger.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English in the sense 'in or into subjection, under control' (see under-, hand)

entry.def: If an action is underhand or if it is done in an underhand way, it is done secretly and dishonestly.

example.ex: ...a list of the underhanded ways in which their influence operates in the United States...
example.tran: 他们在美国施展影响的一系列阴险手段

entry.def: You use underhand or underhanded to describe actions, such as throwing a ball, in which you do not raise your arm above your shoulder.

means.word_mean: 1. with hand brought forward and up from below shoulder level;

sentences.sentence: "achieved success in business only by underhand methods"
"oldline aristocratic diplomats underhandedly undermined the attempt...to align Germany with the Western democracies"- C.G.Bowers

means.word_mean: 2. with the hand swung below shoulder level';

auth_sentence.content: The company will not tolerate coercive and underhand practices.
auth_sentence.res_content: The company will not tolerate coercive and underhand practices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The company will not tolerate coercive and underhand practices.

auth_sentence.content: Parliamentary leaders were...aware of the underhand nature of their king.
auth_sentence.res_content: Parliamentary leaders were...aware of the underhand nature of their king.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Parliamentary leaders were...aware of the underhand nature of their king.

auth_sentence.content: His Majesty was underhand preparing for war.
auth_sentence.res_content: His Majesty was underhand preparing for war.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His Majesty was underhand preparing for war.

means.word_mean: 暗中或秘密进行的;诡诈的

sentences.en: An honest man doesn’t do anything underhand.
Underhand work of that sort is against the grain with me.
sentences.cn: 这种欺诈的勾当跟我格格不入。
